name: reloaded light rifle ammo
description: Hand-loaded ammunition for lighter rifles, designed for small game and humans.

name: reloaded rifle ammo
description: Hand-loaded ammunition for rifles, meant for taking down large game or humans.

name: reloaded pistol ammo
description: Hand-loaded ammunition for semiautomatic pistols as well as submachine guns.

name: reloaded pistol ammo+
description: Hand-loaded ammunition for pistols, packed with extra powder.  It trades improved damage for increased recoil.

name: reloaded pistol ammo, AP
description: Hand-loaded armor-piercing ammunition for pistols.  It trades improved penetration for slightly reduced damage.

name: reloaded revolver ammo
description: Hand-loaded ammunition for large revolvers and magnum pistols, as well as a few carbines.

name: reloaded light rifle ammo, incendiary
description: Hand-loaded incendiary ammunition for lighter rifles, designed to burn hotly upon impact, piercing armor and igniting flammable substances.

name: reloaded rifle ammo, incendiary
description: Hand-loaded incendiary ammunition for rifles, designed to burn hotly upon impact, piercing armor and igniting flammable substances.  This one has been hand-reloaded.

name: reloaded heavy rifle ammo
description: Hand-loaded ammunition for heavy machineguns and special military hardware, intended for destroying vehicles or very large creatures.

name: reloaded heavy rifle ammo, AP
description: Hand-loaded armor-piercing ammunition for heavy machineguns and other military hardware.  It trades improved penetration for slightly reduced damage.

name: reloaded heavy rifle ammo, incendiary
description: Hand-loaded ammunition for heavy machine guns and other military hardware, designed to burn hotly upon impact, piercing armor and igniting flammable substances.
